mapper.select: select * from userinfo where userid=#{uid} and userpwd=#{upwd}
mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (userid, username, userpwd, email, phone, address, job) values (#{userid},#{username},#{userpwd},#{email},#{phone},#{address},#{job})
mapper.update: update userinfo set email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, job=#{job} where userid = #{userid}
